moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: You attempt to absorb some of the target's health. Make a melee attack. On a hit, the creature takes 1d4 + MOVE grass damage. Half the damage done is restored by the user.
moves.higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
